dcterms:creator: L. McClelland
D. E. Rumelhart
PDP Research Group
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: L. McClelland
D. E. Rumelhart
PDP Research Group
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images of clothing items, designed to serve as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: L. McClelland
D. E. Rumelhart
PDP Research Group
dcterms:description: A variant of the MNIST dataset where the pixels of the images are permuted according to a fixed random permutation. This dataset is used for testing the ability of models to learn from sequential tasks.
dcterms:title: Permuted MNIST
